title: Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity (1971 Western) Betrayal and bullets in the race for gold! 4K

sources.title: Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity (1971 Western) Betrayal and bullets in the race for gold! 4K
sources.description:
A gang of outlaws led by Quinn Paradine hunts for goldmine papers. Sarah Baldwin narrowly escapes with her family's prized mine documents and finds unexpected allies in Marshal Thomas and journalist George Shelley,  At Papa Martinez’s Inn, alliances shatter, bullets fly, and the line between hero and villain blurs in a fight for survival. There, they confront the scheming Quinn Paradine and his accomplices.  Dangerous plots intertwine, leading to a tense showdown amidst the threat of an impending Indian attack.

Original title: I quattro pistoleri di Santa Trinità (1971)

This film is available in English, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.  And is also subtitled in many languages.

Director: Giorgio Cristallini
Writers: Giorgio Cristallini, Ted Rusoff
Genre: Italian cinema, Western movie, 

Main Actors:
Peter Lee Lawrence - George Shelley
Daniela Giordano - Sarah Baldwin
Umberto Raho - Quinn Paradine
Philippe Hersent - Marshal Thomas
Evelyn Stewart - Julia
Ralph Baldwin - Dingus
Valeria Fabrizi - Adeline Martinez
Antonella Murgia - Ana
Tonino Pierfederici - Papa Jimmy Martinez
Daniele Vargas - Thompson
Paul Oxon - Navarro Jefferson
Salvatore Furnari - Ned the midget
